The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 September is 315,284 (560.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 September, there were 17,523 new confirmed cases (31.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 September, there were 9,008 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 95% (8515 extra cases).
